name: Water Trouble
description:
Water trouble is an endless runner game which can be a great time killer! While retaining it's fun to play goal , it also makes you feel competitive by making you want to beat your high-score. Collect coins to unlock perks which can make the game easier. You can play it with your friends and see who can make the best score!

It supports both controller and Mouse/Keyboard.

Mouse/Keyboard controls : 

Movement -> ASWD

Jump -> SpaceBar

Pause -> Escape or P

Contoller controls :

Movement/Camera -> Classic ones

Jumping -> Bottom button
